name: sites
1): open a terminal and cd to project root
2): run any command with: npm run [command]
4): Another example command: npm run deploy:dev:project1

scripts.e.g. deploy website to server: [siteA:dev] -starts local server, siteA:build -creates site at public/
scripts.siteA:deploy:dev: cd public/project1 && firebase use multisite-hosting-dev && firebase deploy --only hosting:siteA
scripts.siteA:deploy:prod: cd public/project1 && firebase use multisite-hosting && firebase deploy --only hosting:siteA
scripts.siteB:deploy:dev: cd public/project1 && firebase use multisite-hosting-dev && firebase deploy --only hosting:siteB
scripts.siteB:deploy:prod: cd public/project1 && firebase use multisite-hosting && firebase deploy --only hosting:siteB
scripts.site1:deploy:dev: cd public/project2 && firebase use multisite-hosting-2-dev && firebase deploy --only hosting:site1
scripts.site1:deploy:prod: cd public/project2 && firebase use multisite-hosting-2 && firebase deploy --only hosting:site1
scripts.site2:deploy:dev: cd public/project2 && firebase use multisite-hosting-2-dev && firebase deploy --only hosting:site2
scripts.site2:deploy:prod: cd public/project2 && firebase use multisite-hosting-2 && firebase deploy --only hosting:site2
scripts.all:dev:start: npm run siteA:dev & npm run siteB:dev & npm run site1:dev & npm run site2:dev
scripts.all:build: npm run siteA:build & npm run siteB:build & npm run site1:build & npm run site2:build
scripts.e.g. deploy all project1 sites to dev: [deploy:dev:project1] -upload to dev server all sites in public/project1
scripts.project1:deploy:dev: cd public/project1 && firebase use multisite-hosting-dev && firebase deploy
scripts.project1:deploy:prod: cd public/project1 && firebase use multisite-hosting && firebase deploy
scripts.project2:deploy:dev: cd public/project2 && firebase use multisite-hosting-2-dev && firebase deploy
scripts.project2:deploy:prod: cd public/project2 && firebase use multisite-hosting-2 && firebase deploy
scripts.all:deploy:dev: npm run project1:deploy:dev && npm run project2:deploy:dev
scripts.all:deploy:prod: npm run project1:deploy:prod && npm run project2:deploy:prod
